preset.name: preset
preset.description: The preset to apply to the current command.

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Increase the verbosity of the logs.

template.name: template
template.description:
The app template. Accepts one of the following:
       - <node|php|ruby>
       - Any GitHub repo with optional branch and subpath eg: https://github.com/Shopify/<repository>/[subpath]#[branch]
